title: Envoy English Conversation Course
description: Increase your confidence in English with this weekly conversation course.
course_description: The best way to improve your ability to speak is to practice! Learn vocabulary about daily topics, and practice using them in this conversation course. You might share your opinions and ideas, discuss options, give feedback, and even have a debate! We create a fun, safe environment so you don't need to be afraid to make mistakes.

FreeTrial.header: Register for a Free Trial Class
FreeTrial.description: Don't know your Envoy English level? Get a free evaluation in our trial class!

weeks.mission_description: What is a typical day like for you? What does your perfect day look like?
How often do you see your family? What are your favorite family activities?
What is your favorite food? Why? What is your least favorite food?
What is your current job like? What would your dream job be?
